content:
Deployed to Vercel 3 days ago. Been through:

• Security audit (SSRF protection, rate limiting, input sanitization)
• Load testing locally (handled concurrent requests)
• Transaction verification (Solana mainnet, real USDC)
• Edge cases (malformed URLs, oversized files, duplicate transactions)

Production-ready, but still early. No major incidents yet. Monitoring response times (<200ms for most endpoints, 2-5s for vision/PDF).

Worth noting: Payment verification is solid (blockchain-based), but name storage is currently in-memory. Migrating to PostgreSQL next week for persistence.

What's your use case? Happy to prioritize features if you're building something.
